title: Apple I phone 6S
review: Wonderful experience

title: REVIEW AFTER USING FOR 6 MONTHS.
review:
I used this phone for 6 months and then sold it for a Galaxy s7 . So here are the pros and cons -
Pros-
Good build 
Responsive fingerprint scanner
iPhone brand value
iOS ecosystem is very simplistic and easy to use and also very dependable with barely any crashes and bugs.
Front camera is really good and offers great amount of detail
Ram management and speed is top notch. Phone never lags and never fails to not keep apps in memory.
Audio via headphone jack is one of the best and yes it has a headphone jack.
Very frequent updates.
CONS-
Rear camera produces very dim pictures and makes the sky look very unrealistic with poor dynamic range.
Display resolution is only 720P . though this won't affect your day to day usage but forget about using it with VR.
IPS LCD display is not even close to the vivid and very good looking colors provided by AMOLED displays which most phones in this price segment use.
iOS lacks practicality in some cases . Lack of proper shortcuts etc etc
3D touch is really a waste and you will barely even use it . It's only compatible with a very limited number of apps and also functionality is quite low.
Rear camera very bad at taking low light shots due to a f2.2 aperture.
REASONS NOT TO BUY THIS PHONE-
Phones in this price have AMOLED displays which is far more superior to IPS LCD found in iPhone. 
Other phones offer 1080p and above resolutions making them good to view in VR.
Other phones have way better cameras such as the s7, one plus 3T , LG V20 ,HTC 10 etc
Some other phones come with water resistance such as the s7 which is very useful.
S7 also comes with wireless charging.

title: Outstanding
review: In love with it

title: Got Iphone 6S 32 GB for Rs 27249/-
review:
I have got my iphone 6s 32 gb gold right on scheduled delivery date 16th October 2017. 

Cost me : Rs 27249/-
Ordered on 14th october 2017 within one hour when BIG DIWALI sale started
Offers : extra 1750 instant cashback on HDFC card

I have been using this phone since 3 days now and it is working absolutely fine. I have found no issues yet. I have been very conscious and nervous while ordering from flipkart because of the negative reviews that i saw for this product. However, this special price offer pushed me to order it. 

I have got the iphone with ios 11.0.3 installed . And it is working butter smooth. Ios 11 has many good features like we can now do recording of our iphone screen, customise control center, power saver for battery and many more. 

Yes battery is not for heavy game users otherwise it does not disappoints you. 

My reviews is five star for the Flipkart special price deal and the great product. 

Thank you flipkart and seller for making my Diwali more special. 


Well done and keep up the good work.

title: Excellent phone at a excellent price.
review:
Excellent phone..first of all thanks Flipkart because i have purchased this phone at 30k which is very low price than other online or offline store. And i have verified from apple store and they said this is genuine product. So if you are thinking to buy a iPhone at very reasonable price just go for Flipkart.

Regarding phone:

Performance- 5 out of 5
Display-4.5 out of 5
Battery life- 4 out of 5(if you are a heavy user then you have to charge your phone twice a day)
Camera-4 out of 5( but low light pictures are disappointing)
Value for money-4 out of 5(according to 30 thousand rupees which was my bought price)
